name: NEAPOLIS UNIVERSITY PAFOS
goal:
Neapolis University is a private own higher education institute with primary target being the creation of a dynamic learning environment focusing on fundamental and applied research in academic areas. Investment in state-of-the-art learning technologies together with the recruiting of faculty members with long experience in teaching and research at international universities provide the guarantee for academic excellence.
NUP offers undergraduate Programmes in Business Administration, Accounting, Banking & Finance, Law, Psychology, Architecture, Landscape Architecture and Real Estate. The postgraduate programs of the University cover Business Administration, Banking, Investment & Finance, Public Administration, International & European Business Law. NUP has developed links with the countryâ€™s business community and an extensive collaboration network with institutions and organisations worldwide
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Lifelong Learning Programme
The Comenius programme - relating to primary and secondary education.
The Erasmus programme - relating to higher education.
The Leonardo da Vinci programme - relating to vocational education and training.
Internal quality assurance system.
